Actions.description: The available actions for this Resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.

FabricAdapter.description: A FabricAdapter represents the physical fabric adapter capable of connecting to an interconnect fabric.  Examples include but are not limited to Ethernet, NVMe over Fabrics, Gen-Z, and SAS fabric adapters.
FabricAdapter.longDescription: A FabricAdapter represents the physical Fabric adapter capable of connecting to an interconnect fabric.  Examples include but are not limited to Ethernet, NVMe over Fabrics, Gen-Z, and SAS fabric adapters.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ASICManufacturer.description: The manufacturer name for the ASIC of this fabric adapter.
ASICManufacturer.longDescription: This property shall contain the manufacturer name of the ASIC for the fabric adapter as defined by the manufacturer.

ASICPartNumber.description: The part number for the ASIC on this fabric adapter.
ASICPartNumber.longDescription: This property shall contain the part number of the ASIC for the fabric adapter as defined by the manufacturer.

ASICRevisionIdentifier.description: The revision identifier for the ASIC on this fabric adapter.
ASICRevisionIdentifier.longDescription: This property shall contain the revision identifier of the ASIC for the fabric adapter as defined by the manufacturer.

Actions.description: The available actions for this Resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this Resource.

FabricType.description: The configured fabric type of this fabric adapter.
FabricType.longDescription: This property shall contain the configured fabric type of this fabric adapter.

FabricTypeCapabilities.description: An array of fabric types supported by this fabric adapter.
FabricTypeCapabilities.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of fabric types supported by this fabric adapter.

FirmwareVersion.description: The firmware version of this fabric adapter.
FirmwareVersion.longDescription: This property shall contain the firmware version for the fabric adapter as defined by the manufacturer.

GenZ.description: The Gen-Z specific properties for this fabric adapter.
GenZ.longDescription: This property shall contain the Gen-Z specific properties for this fabric adapter.

Links.description: The links to other Resources that are related to this Resource.
Links.longDescription: The Redfish Specification-described Links Property shall contain links to Resources related to but not subordinate to this Resource.

Location.description: The location of the fabric adapter.
Location.longDescription: This property shall contain location information for the fabric adapter.

LocationIndicatorActive.description: An indicator allowing an operator to physically locate this resource.
LocationIndicatorActive.longDescription: This property shall contain the state of the indicator used to physically identify or locate this resource.

Manufacturer.description: The manufacturer or OEM of this fabric adapter.
Manufacturer.longDescription: This property shall contain a value that represents the manufacturer of the fabric adapter.

Model.description: The model string for this fabric adapter.
Model.longDescription: This property shall contain the information about how the manufacturer refers to this fabric adapter.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PCIeInterface.description: The PCIe interface details for this fabric adapter.
PCIeInterface.longDescription: This property shall contain details on the PCIe interface that connects this PCIe-based fabric adapter to its host.

PartNumber.description: The part number for this fabric adapter.
PartNumber.longDescription: This property shall contain the part number for the fabric adapter as defined by the manufacturer.

Ports.description: The link to the collection of ports that exist on the fabric adapter.
Ports.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a Resource Collection of type PortCollection.

SKU.description: The manufacturer SKU for this fabric adapter.
SKU.longDescription: This property shall contain the SKU for the fabric adapter.

SerialNumber.description: The serial number for this fabric adapter.
SerialNumber.longDescription: This property shall contain the serial number for the fabric adapter.

SparePartNumber.description: The spare part number for this fabric adapter.
SparePartNumber.longDescription: This property shall contain the spare part number for the fabric adapter as defined by the manufacturer.

Status.description: The status and health of the Resource and its subordinate or dependent Resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the Resource.

UUID.description: The UUID for this fabric adapter.
UUID.longDescription: This property shall contain a universal unique identifier number for the fabric adapter.

GenZ.description: Gen-Z related properties for a fabric adapter.
GenZ.longDescription: This type shall contain Gen-Z related properties for a fabric adapter.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

MSDT.description: The Multi Subnet Destination Table for the component.
MSDT.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a Resource Collection of type RouteEntryCollection, and shall represent the Gen-Z Core Specification-defined MSDT structure.

PIDT.description: An array of table entry values for the Packet Injection Delay Table.
PIDT.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of table entry values for the Gen-Z Core Specification-defined Packet Injection Delay Table for the component.

RITable.description: An array of table entry values for the Responder Interface Table.
RITable.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of table entry values for the Gen-Z Core Specification-defined Responder Interface Table for the component.

RequestorVCAT.description: The Requestor Virtual Channel Action Table for the component.
RequestorVCAT.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a Resource Collection of type VCATEntryCollection, and shall represent the Gen-Z Core Specification-defined REQ-VCAT structure.

ResponderVCAT.description: The Responder Virtual Channel Action Table for the component.
ResponderVCAT.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a Resource Collection of type VCATEntryCollection, and shall represent the Gen-Z Core Specification-defined RSP-VCAT structure.

SSDT.description: The Single Subnet Destination Table for the component.
SSDT.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a Resource Collection of type RouteEntryCollection, and shall represent the Gen-Z Core Specification-defined SSDT structure.

Links.description: The links to other Resources that are related to this Resource.
Links.longDescription: The Redfish Specification-described type shall contain links to Resources related to but not subordinate to this Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Endpoints.description: An array of links to the endpoints that represent the logical fabric connection to this fabric adapter.
Endpoints.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to Resources of type Endpoint that represents the logical fabric connection associated with this fabric adapter.

MemoryDomains.description: An array of links to the memory domains associated with this fabric adapter.
MemoryDomains.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type MemoryDomain that represent the memory domains associated with this fabric adapter.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PCIeDevices.description: An array of links to the PCIe devices associated with this fabric adapter.
PCIeDevices.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type PCIeDevice that represent the PCIe devices associated with this fabric adapter.

Processors.description: An array of links to the processors that this fabric adapter provides to a fabric.
Processors.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type Processor that represent the processors that this fabric adapter provides to a fabric.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #FabricAdapter.v1_5_0.FabricAdapter
